padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	当妊娠时间＜36 周孕妇发生 HSV 复发感染，即使临床症状严重也不应使用抗病毒治疗。而临床症状十分严重，抗病毒治疗无法避免时，治疗也应考虑个体化方案。当妊娠时间＞36 周后使用抗病毒治疗可以降低其传染性，缓解临床症状，降低剖宫产率。在缺乏大量临床安全研究数据的情况下，怀孕妇女只有出现抗病毒治疗指征时，才可使用阿昔洛韦和伐昔洛韦。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">问题 51：妇女无 HSV 感染病史也要进行血清学检查吗?</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	婴儿在娩出过程中感染 HSV，其中 60%-80% 之前并无 HSV 感染史或性伴侣无生殖器疱疹史。70% 的母亲直到发现新生儿被感染后才知道被感染了。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">问题 52：妊娠期首发生殖器疱疹产后新生儿怎样处置?</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	妊娠期首发生殖器疱疹的孕妇产后新生儿应该按如下方法处置：</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	1. 首先应该通知儿科医生。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	2. 为了早期发现新生儿感染应该做尿、便、口咽、眼和皮肤的 HSV 培养。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	3. 在培养结果未出来时，应权衡利弊，研究是否启动阿昔洛韦治疗。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	4. 如果不立即启动阿昔洛韦治疗，应密切监测新生儿有无嗜睡、发热、拒食或病变的迹象。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">问题 53：妊娠期复发生殖器疱疹产后新生儿怎样处置?</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	虽然有些医师认为，妊娠期复发生殖器疱疹的孕妇产后应该取一组标本进行病毒培养，有助于早期发现新生儿感染，但没有任何证据支持这一做法。然而，应建议医生和家长如果婴儿有皮肤、眼睛或黏膜的任何病变，特别是在出生 2 周内，应考虑 HSV 感染的鉴别诊断。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<br class=\"Apple-interchange-newline\" />\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; text-align: center; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: normal; letter-spacing: normal; line-height: 25.6px; orphans: auto; text-align: start; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; widows: 1; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);\">\r\n	来源：中华检验医学网</p>\r\n','','','119.136.154.147');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('108','7','<strong><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 作者：黄锦海</strong><br />\r\n<span style=\"font-size:14px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2017</span></strong><span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><strong>年4月22日</strong><strong>，公司组织全体成员一起去广州从化碧水湾温泉两日游。早上的天气还不错，八点半我们就从福田出发往广州从化。经过两个半左右的时间，我们抵达目的地。</strong><br />\r\n<strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 碧水湾度假村四面林木苍翠，现已入春绿色更是赏心悦目，空气清新宜人，群山将城市的浮躁隔离，把宁静与平和聚拢，如我将生活的烦恼抛弃，释放所有的欢愉，一种久违的轻松油然而起。刚进到大厅，就能感受到酒店员工对顾客表达出的热情，服务员指引我们到大堂先坐下，然后面带微笑的给我们倒水。大厅的装饰很美，也很干净。</strong></span>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><strong><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/170502/1-1F502162933163.png\" style=\"width: 526px; height: 249px;\" /></strong></span></div>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><strong><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 大家换好泳装急不可待地奔向温泉池。四月的天乍暖还寒,刚下水，身体还是有点不适这水温，慢慢地肌肤开始适应泉水的温度，随后就变得舒缓起来。感觉这时泉水是柔和的，使僵硬的关节得到舒展，紧张得到缓解。沐浴着泉水，不用紧绷着每一条神经和每一个细胞，而是需要放开周身的毛孔任泉水涤荡。很多时候人们都需要这样的一种宁静，一种身心的放松，平和清淡的状态。</strong><br />\r\n<strong>温泉有很多种池子，有药池，鱼疗池，冰火池。泡温泉是一个逐渐过渡到最后适应的过程，如对待工作和新鲜事物，更是一个适可而止的心态，如对待生活不可贪念的态度。温泉不能泡太久，需要把持一个度，也是一个把握心情的度，一个能在冷热交替的情景中收发自如的状态。每次在一个池子泡了大概半个小时，就躺在椅子上休息一下，然后换池子继续放松身体。</strong></strong></span>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><strong><strong><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/170502/1-1F502162954407.png\" style=\"width: 550px; height: 180px;\" /></strong></strong></span></div>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><strong><strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 晚饭后，我们就去二楼的娱乐场所打球。这里的娱乐设施有很多，有乒乓球，桌球，棋牌室等。服务员们服务态度很好，我们不懂的，她们都会耐心给我们解答。当你在提着重物或者在找地方的时候，服务员都会主动上前来问:请问需要帮忙吗&rdquo;.我和几个同事打了一个多小时乒乓球，虽然很久没打乒乓球了，打了一小段时间还是找到以前的感觉。我们打七个球，轮流上场，有说有笑，增进了同事们之间的情感。</strong><br />\r\n<strong>第二天早上，我们去湖边散步。湖水很绿，对应岸上的绿草茵茵，一切都感觉那么的美，那么平静。用三个字总结这两天的游玩，美滋滋。中午十二点半，我们就集合返程了。</strong><br />\r\n<br />\r\n<strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 很多同事都说这的服务很好，确实，这里不管是服务员还是扫地的阿姨，他们的每一个细节都做的很到位。其实，不管是在生活中还是在工作中，我们都应该要注重细节，细节决定成败。</strong><br />\r\n<strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 很感谢公司组织的这次活动，让我们的身体得到放松，心情得到缓解，让我从中学到了很多。愿公司越做越好!以后的活动也会越来越多!</strong></strong></span>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><strong><strong><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/170502/1-1F50216301U52.png\" style=\"width: 477px; height: 330px;\" /></strong></strong></span></div>\r\n<br />\r\n','','','119.136.155.80');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('109','7','&nbsp;\r\n<div>\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp; 文：丁婧璇/王赫群&nbsp;<br />\r\n	&nbsp;<br />\r\n	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 2017年5月9-10日，公司委派注册部参加了国家食品药品监督管理总局医疗器械技术审评中心举办的为期两天的专题培训班，培训班的内容是关于注册申报受理业务的专题。<br />\r\n	<br />\r\n	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 第一天，总局领导介绍了医疗器械注册管理法规概况及最新进展，先是回顾医疗器械法规的确立和发展过程，随后为学员们介绍了医疗器械注册审评审批改革方向。现在新《医疗器械管理条例》的修订原则遵循：建立严格的覆盖全过程的监管制度；深化行政审批制度改革；推进政府只能改变，简政放权。这对医疗器械企业的生产、注册、经营和使用等环节，都具有指导意义。<br />\r\n	<br />\r\n	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 在简要介绍受理工作情况后，授课老师分享了境内、进口医疗器械受理标准详解及常见问题分析，体外诊断试剂受理标准详解及进口一类医疗器械备案等培训内容。授课老师从医疗器械注册申报、延续、变更的资料要求到医疗器械注册信息系统的填报等方面，详细阐述了如何通过形式审查的要求。在第二天下午，审评中心领导组织了专场答疑，对学员提出的各方面问题做了一一详尽解答。<br />\r\n	<br />\r\n	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 此次培训让参与学习的同事受益匪浅，有助于提高日后提交材料的准确性和材料编写速度，促进产品申报工作的进展，规避因对政策的陌生导致的时间和资源浪费。<br />\r\n	<br />\r\n	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 此外，通过此次培训让注册部各位同事加深了对国家CFDA技术审评相关政策的了解，不仅巩固了相关注册申报政策及理论知识储备，还为今后的产品注册申报工作顺利开展打下良好基础。</span><br />\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:16px;\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/170522/1-1F5221G11a47.png\" style=\"width: 884px; height: 496px;\" /></span></div>\r\n','','','119.136.153.184');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('110','7','<strong>公司注册部参加国家药监局组织的专题培训</strong><br />\r\n&nbsp;<br />\r\n文：丁婧璇/王赫群&nbsp;<br />\r\n&nbsp;<br />\r\n2017年5月9-10日，公司委派注册部参加了国家食品药品监督管理总局医疗器械技术审评中心举办的为期两天的专题培训班，培训班的内容是关于注册申报受理业务的专题培训。<br />\r\n第一天，总局领导介绍了医疗器械注册管理法规概况及最新进展，先是回顾医疗器械法规的确立和发展过程，随后为学员们介绍了医疗器械注册审评审批改革方向。现在新《医疗器械管理条例》的修订原则遵循：建立严格的覆盖全过程的监管制度；深化行政审批制度改革；推进政府只能改变，简政放权。这对医疗器械企业的生产、注册、经营和使用等环节，都具有指导意义。<br />\r\n在简要介绍受理工作情况后，授课老师分享了境内、进口医疗器械受理标准详解及常见问题分析，体外诊断试剂受理标准详解及进口一类医疗器械备案等培训内容。授课老师从医疗器械注册申报、延续、变更的资料要求到医疗器械注册信息系统的填报等方面，详细阐述了如何通过形式审查的要求。在第二天下午，审评中心领导组织了专场答疑，对学员提出的各方面问题做了一一详尽解答。<br />\r\n此次培训让参与学习的同事受益匪浅，有助于提高日后提交材料的准确性和材料编写速度，促进产品申报工作的进展，规避因对政策的陌生导致的时间和资源浪费。<br />\r\n此外，通过此次培训让注册部各位同事加深了对国家CFDA技术审评相关政策的了解，不仅巩固了相关注册申报政策及理论知识储备，还为今后的产品注册申报工作顺利开展打下良好基础。<br />\r\n<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/170522/1-1F5221I543143.jpg\" style=\"width: 553px; height: 311px;\" />','','','119.136.153.184');

INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('112','6','<section data-id=\"41173\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; border: 0px none; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<h2 style=\"margin: 8px 0px 0px; padding: 0px; font-size: 16px; max-width: 100%; color: rgb(12, 137, 24); min-height: 32px; border-bottom-width: 1.5px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-color: rgb(12, 137, 24); text-align: justify; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px; line-height: 22.4px;\">什么是体外诊断试剂？</span></h2>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 25.6px; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	众所周知，我们在医院做的血常规、尿常规、便常规、血糖监测、贫血筛查等等都要用到诊断试剂。而这些诊断试剂正常都是不与人体接触来进行使用的，所以就叫做&ldquo;体外诊断试剂&rdquo;了吗？</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	依照《体外诊断试剂注册管理办法》，按医疗器械管理的体外诊断试剂（IVD），包括在疾病的预测、预防、诊断、治疗监测、预后观察和健康状态评价的过程中，用于人体样本体外检测的试剂、试剂盒、校准品、质控品等产品。可以单独使用，也可以与仪器、器具、设备或者系统组合使用。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	现在，疾病预防、临床诊治基本上都需要用到体外诊断试剂。不管是血尿便三大常规检测，还是病毒、细菌感染的鉴别，或是心肝肾血管、免疫功能检查等，都离不开体外诊断试剂。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: \'Hiragino Sans GB\', \'Microsoft YaHei\', Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em;
