font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 6px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(249, 110, 87); font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			问题3　TORCH感染检测指标的临床意义有什么不同？</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">直接指标</span>(病毒抗原、病毒DNA、病毒RNA病毒培养)检测的是病毒本身，与病毒的复制规律、潜伏位置等特性有关，适合于诊断。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">间接指标</span>(IgG、IgM)检测病毒刺激机体后产生的免疫反应，与个体的免疫功能有关，适合于筛查和免疫状态评估。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 6px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(249, 110, 87); font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			问题4　妊娠期感染分为几种？</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		妊娠期感染分为初次(原发)感染、既往感染、复发感染、再感染，其概念不能混淆。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">初次感染又称原发感染</span></strong></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		妊娠妇女血清第1次出现病毒特异性抗体IgG阳性，而先前血清学试验是阴性称为初次感染。只有先前做过筛查，结果是阴性并存档(或保存孕妇血清标本)，这样做才能判定初次感染。IgG抗体亲和力测定有助于从既往感染和复发感染中区分初次感染，并且确定何时感染。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">既往感染</span></strong></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		曾经感染过该病毒，身体产生了抗体或病毒休眠以潜伏状态存在。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">复发感染</span></strong></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		宿主免疫功能的存在下的病毒间歇性排泄，是潜伏内源性病毒再激活。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">再感染</span></strong></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		已经被免疫的个体接触到一个外源性新病毒，发生再感染。目前不能通过血清学方法区分复发感染和再感染，只能通过病毒分离和分子生物学方法区分。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">先天性感染</span></strong></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		病毒经胎盘传播的结果。母亲的初次或复发感染都可将病毒传播给胎儿，造成胎儿先天感染。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 6px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(249, 110, 87); font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			问题5　为什么筛查实验IgG、IgM应同时做？</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">筛查实验IgG、IgM应同时做，单做IgM往往给出不宜解释的结果。</span></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		IgM阳性不能充分证明近期感染，部分人群感染后IgM可连续存在数年，单纯IgM阳性不能诊断。定量检测IgG/IgM参考值范围的确定是采用已知阳性和阴性标本，进行定量分析而确定的。受灵敏度和特异性的制约，仍有假阴、假阳性结果。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 6px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(249, 110, 87); font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			问题6　为什么抗体筛查没有绝对的参考值？</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">人体对病毒感染免疫反应不同，抗体水平存在很大个体差异。</span>TORCH病毒感染是一个从母亲-胎儿的动态过程，每个时间段没有明显截止点，IgG/IgM浓度切割值是感染指标，但具有局限性，个体浓度梯度变化才更有临床意义，例如当IgG上升4倍时常作为病毒复发或再感染的指标。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 6px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(249, 110, 87); font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			问题7　为什么定量分析是TORCH筛查的进步和最佳选择？</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		妊娠期发生初次感染或复发感染体内产生IgG或IgM是一个急剧变化的过程，只有通过定量分析浓度变化才能检测到。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">定量分析有助于发现假阳性或假阴性结果。</span></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 6px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(249, 110, 87); font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			问题8　TORCH筛查IgM、IgG抗体产生意义？</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		机体具备一定的免疫力，当机体遭受病原体感染时，体内会产生相应的抗体(免疫球蛋白)，来抵抗病原体，以保护机体功能的正常运转。一般规律是先产生IgM抗体，然后产生IgG抗体。IgM抗体滴度在达到高峰后很快开始逐渐下降至较低水平，下降后一般不易检出。而IgG抗体达到高峰后则基本稳定在一个较高的滴度且持续较长时间。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 6px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(249, 110, 87); font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			问题9　如何诊断妊娠期巨细胞病毒初次和复发感染？</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; text-decoration: inherit; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">初次感染</span></strong></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; text-decoration: inherit; line-height: 1.6;\">妊娠期初次母体巨细胞感染的诊断应该基于孕妇血清中病毒特异性IgG抗体的新出现(这些孕妇之前的血清反应为阴性)，或者发现特异性的IgM抗体并伴随IgG抗体亲和力的降低。&nbsp;</span></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; text-decoration: inherit; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">复发感染</span></strong></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		诊断应该基于孕妇之前检测IgG抗体阳性，本次IgG抗体滴度的显著升高(定量检测上升4倍)，伴有或者不伴有IgM抗体的出现，以及IgG的高亲和力(&le;16周)；或者从尿液、唾液或咽拭子标本或人体其他组织培养巨细胞病毒阳性；或者从尿液、唾液或咽拭子标本或人体其他组织定量聚合酶链式反应检测巨细胞病毒高拷贝数。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 6px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(249, 110, 87); font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			问题10　如何诊断母体风疹病毒感染？</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">通过血清学方法测定风疹病毒特异性IgG、IgM是一种简便、敏感、准确的方法，诊断标准如下。</span></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		急性和恢复期血清样本间风疹病毒IgG抗体滴度增加4倍。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		风疹病毒特异性IgM抗体阳性。孕妇血IgM阳性同时还要出现血清学转换指标，即出现IgG由阴性转变成阳性。或者孕妇血IgM阳性同时还要出现IgG抗体连续双份血清出现4倍增高(0.5～1个月间)。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		风疹病毒培养阳性(患者临床样本的病毒分离培养)。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">值得注意的是，</span>血清学试验最好在皮疹出现的7～10 d内检测，2～3周后重复检测1次。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 6px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(249, 110, 87); font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			问题11　如何鉴别处理弓形虫既往感染和近期感染？</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		血清弓形虫IgG抗体阴性，IgM阴性：无弓形虫既往感染和近期感染，无须处理。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		血清弓形虫IgG抗体阳性，IgM阳性：弓形虫既往感染(有免疫力)，无近期感染，无须处理。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">血清弓形虫IgG抗体阴性，IgM阳性，有2种可能：</span>一是弓形虫感染的初期(窗口期)，IgM抗体已经阳性，但IgG抗体尚未阳性；二是未感染弓形虫，IgM抗体系假阳性。处置方法：间隔2周后重新抽血再次检测，最好与首次标本同时检测，如果仍然是IgG抗体阴性，IgM阳性结果，说明弓形虫IgM抗体假阳性；如果为IgG抗体阳性，IgM阳性，即弓形虫IgG抗体阳转，考虑弓形虫原发性感染。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		妊娠期感染性疾病是造成死胎、胎儿畸形及儿童智力低下的重要因素之一，其中最重要的是孕妇TORCH的感染。然而对于很多从事妇产科工作的医师来说，对TORCH筛查结果的判读及处理是一大难题，异常结果的误解经常会给患者带来恐惧心理，并在反复检查中加重了他们的经济负担，希望通过对以上问题的解答使更多的医疗工作者走出误区。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 1em; widows: 1; border: 0px; line-height: 1.4; text-align: justify; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 3px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(95, 156, 239); font-size: 18px; font-family: inherit; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(249, 110, 87);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit;\">\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				作者</section>\r\n		</section>\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 5px 0px 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 3px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.4; font-size: 16.0000019073486px; font-family: inherit; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				山东省东阿县医院妇产科　孟丽萍</section>\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				北京协和医院妇产科　马良坤</section>\r\n			<div>\r\n				&nbsp;</div>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: inherit; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</section>\r\n','','','119.136.152.114');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('144','6','<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		机体具备一定的免疫力，当机体遭受病原体感染时，体内会产生相应的抗体(免疫球蛋白)，来抵抗病原体，以保护机体功能的正常运转。一般规律是先产生IgM抗体，然后产生IgG抗体。IgM抗体滴度在达到高峰后很快开始逐渐下降至较低水平，下降后一般不易检出。而IgG抗体达到高峰后则基本稳定在一个较高的滴度且持续较长时间。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 6px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(249, 110, 87); font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			问题9　如何诊断妊娠期巨细胞病毒初次和复发感染？</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; text-decoration: inherit; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">初次感染</span></strong></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; text-decoration: inherit; line-height: 1.6;\">妊娠期初次母体巨细胞感染的诊断应该基于孕妇血清中病毒特异性IgG抗体的新出现(这些孕妇之前的血清反应为阴性)，或者发现特异性的IgM抗体并伴随IgG抗体亲和力的降低。&nbsp;</span></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; text-decoration: inherit; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">复发感染</span></strong></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		诊断应该基于孕妇之前检测IgG抗体阳性，本次IgG抗体滴度的显著升高(定量检测上升4倍)，伴有或者不伴有IgM抗体的出现，以及IgG的高亲和力(&le;16周)；或者从尿液、唾液或咽拭子标本或人体其他组织培养巨细胞病毒阳性；或者从尿液、唾液或咽拭子标本或人体其他组织定量聚合酶链式反应检测巨细胞病毒高拷贝数。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 6px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(249, 110, 87); font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			问题10　如何诊断母体风疹病毒感染？</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">通过血清学方法测定风疹病毒特异性IgG、IgM是一种简便、敏感、准确的方法，诊断标准如下。</span></section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		急性和恢复期血清样本间风疹病毒IgG抗体滴度增加4倍。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		风疹病毒特异性IgM抗体阳性。孕妇血IgM阳性同时还要出现血清学转换指标，即出现IgG由阴性转变成阳性。或者孕妇血IgM阳性同时还要出现IgG抗体连续双份血清出现4倍增高(0.5～1个月间)。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		风疹病毒培养阳性(患者临床样本的病毒分离培养)。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">值得注意的是，</span>血清学试验最好在皮疹出现的7～10 d内检测，2～3周后重复检测1次。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 6px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(249, 110, 87); font-size: 1em; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit; font-weight: bold; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			问题11　如何鉴别处理弓形虫既往感染和近期感染？</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; font-family: inherit; font-size: 1em; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; border: 0px; clear: both; text-align: justify; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(70, 67, 67); word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		血清弓形虫IgG抗体阴性，IgM阴性：无弓形虫既往感染和近期感染，无须处理。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		血清弓形虫IgG抗体阳性，IgM阳性：弓形虫既往感染(有免疫力)，无近期感染，无须处理。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(0, 213, 255);\">血清弓形虫IgG抗体阴性，IgM阳性，有2种可能：</span>一是弓形虫感染的初期(窗口期)，IgM抗体已经阳性，但IgG抗体尚未阳性；二是未感染弓形虫，IgM抗体系假阳性。处置方法：间隔2周后重新抽血再次检测，最好与首次标本同时检测，如果仍然是IgG抗体阴性，IgM阳性结果，说明弓形虫IgM抗体假阳性；如果为IgG抗体阳性，IgM阳性，即弓形虫IgG抗体阳转，考虑弓形虫原发性感染。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		妊娠期感染性疾病是造成死胎、胎儿畸形及儿童智力低下的重要因素之一，其中最重要的是孕妇TORCH的感染。然而对于很多从事妇产科工作的医师来说，对TORCH筛查结果的判读及处理是一大难题，异常结果的误解经常会给患者带来恐惧心理，并在反复检查中加重了他们的经济负担，希望通过对以上问题的解答使更多的医疗工作者走出误区。</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 1em; widows: 1; border: 0px; line-height: 1.4; text-align: justify; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px 8px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; border-left-width: 3px; border-left-style: solid; border-color: rgb(95, 156, 239); font-size: 18px; font-family: inherit; text-decoration: inherit; color: rgb(249, 110, 87);\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.4; font-family: inherit;\">\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				作者</section>\r\n		</section>\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 5px 0px 0px; padding: 0px 0px 0px 3px; max-width: 100%; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n				北京协和医院妇产科　马良坤</section>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n</section>\r\n','','','119.136.153.240');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('145','6','<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); widows: 1; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; background-color: rgb(248, 249, 244); box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	开车斗气、胡乱变线、强行超车&hellip;&hellip;这些都是&ldquo;路怒症&rdquo;发作者的典型症状。美国芝加哥大学公布的一项最新研究称，&ldquo;路怒症&rdquo;或与弓形虫感染有关，受到这种寄生虫感染的人可能引发一种被称为间歇性暴发性障碍（IED）的精神疾病。而IED患者存在突发性的攻击冲动，包括容易&ldquo;路怒&rdquo;。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); widows: 1; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; background-color: rgb(248, 249, 244); box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	弓形虫是猫身上的一种原生动物寄生虫，它会造成受感染生物的行为改变，比如感染了弓形虫的老鼠可能更大胆、更敢于冒险，也因此更容易被猫抓到。弓形虫也可能通过未煮熟的肉或者被污染的水感染人类，并在大脑中形成囊肿，这种感染据称与精神分裂症、双相情感障碍以及自杀行为有一定关联。感染者也会反应迟缓，更易发生车祸。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); widows: 1; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; background-color: rgb(248, 249, 244); box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	芝加哥大学的埃米尔&middot;科卡罗和他的团队则想弄清楚弓形虫感染是否与攻击冲动有关。据《新科学家》杂志网站23日报道，他们招募了358名成人志愿者，并将他们分为三组：IED患者组、其他精神疾病患者组和未诊断出任何精神疾病的对照组。结果表明，IED患者弓形虫检测呈阳性的比例是对照组的两倍，其他精神疾病患者的感染几率也较高；所有检测结果呈阳性的志愿者，在实验中表现出攻击冲动的程度也更高。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); widows: 1; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; background-color: rgb(248, 249, 244); box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	科卡罗认为，弓形虫感染者的攻击冲动增强，可能是因为大脑中的神经递质发生了改变&mdash;&mdash;要么是杏仁核（大脑中控制威胁反应的部分）中的神经元受到了过度刺激，要么是前脑功能受损。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); widows: 1; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 2em; background-color: rgb(248, 249, 244); box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	他同时强调，这项研究只是表明了弓形虫感染和攻击冲动之间有关联，但并不一定会致人暴怒。有一种方法可以进行验证，那就是对检测呈阳性的IED患者施以弓形虫感染治疗，看看能否使他们的行为有所改变，但唯一的问题是，治疗过程很长，因为弓形虫很难被杀死。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	来源：科学网</p>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n','','','119.136.153.240');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('146','6','<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: arial, 宋体, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 24px; text-indent: 28px;\">TORCH：指可导致先天性宫内感染及围产期感染而引起围产儿畸形的病原体，它是一组病原微生物的英文名称缩写，其中T（Toxoplasma)是弓形虫，R(Rubella.Virus)是风疹病毒，C(Cytomegalo.Virus)是巨细胞病毒，H(Herpes.Virus)即是单纯疱疹I/II型。这组微生物感染有着共同的特征，即可造成母婴感染。孕妇由于内分泌改变和免疫力下降易发生原发感染，既往感染的孕妇体内潜在的病毒也容易被激活而发生复发感染。孕妇发生病毒血症时，病毒可通过胎盘或产道传播感染胎儿，引起早产、流产、死胎或畸胎等，以及引起新生儿多个系统、多个器官的损害，造成不同程度的智力障碍等症状。特别在怀孕初的三个月胚胎处于器官形成期，此时受病毒感染，可破坏细胞或抑制细胞的分裂和增殖。器官形成期以后感染病毒，可破坏组织和器官结构，并可形成持续感染，出生后继续排毒，能引起相应的病变。TORCH的感染影响者人口素质，与优生优育有重要关系。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; TORCH综合症患者造成孕妇流产、死胎，出生后有严重的智力障碍，生活不能自理，造成极大的精神及经济负担。我国每年约有26000个TORCH患儿出生，平均每小时就有3人，对优生优育与人口素质构成极大的威胁，因此它的感染诊治工作引起普遍关注。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; TORCH感染是严重危害新生儿健康的重要因素之一。可导致多器官损害及一系列严重后遗症嘲 。 因此，为减少病残儿的出生率及提高出生人口素质，临床工作者应进一步加强对孕妇的宣传教育，积极做好TORCH感染的血清学筛查以便及早发现不良妊娠并及时处理。对新生儿也应常规开展TORCH检测，了解新生儿TORCH感染情况，以便早干预、早治疗。TORCH感染的血清学筛查对优生优育具有重要现实意义，临床上应常规开展TORCH检测。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;每对夫妇都渴望拥有一个聪明、活泼、健康的宝宝，然而</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">现实中部分家庭思想观念落后，</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; line-height: 1.6;\">不了解优生优育五项检测内容，在孕前和孕早期未及时做优生优育五项检测及产前诊断，造成许多家庭的痛苦。先天畸形儿与智障儿往往成为其家庭和社会的巨大负担。病原体感染是导致先天性缺陷的重要原因，故TORCH检测显得尤为重要。</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体;\">TORCH病原体共同特征为:&nbsp;当感染发生在孕期时，可通过胎盘或产道引起宫内感染，</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; line-height: 1.6;\">导致胎儿流产、早产、宫内发育迟滞、畸形、死胎和新生儿死亡等，原发感染与复发感染相比，特别是孕早期原发感染，母</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体;\">婴传播率最高，对胎儿造成危害的几率更大，故对孕妇进行产前筛查和感染检测十分重要，能为医生及时作出TORCH</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; line-height: 1.6;\">感染诊断并对控制感染采取必要措施提供有力证据，有助于提高优生优育质量。</span></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px; font-family: 宋体;\">&nbsp; &nbsp; TORCH&nbsp;感染是已知的最主要的先天性微生物致畸因</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">素同时也是宫内感染的主要病因，母体常呈不显性感染，TO</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">Ｒ</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">CH&nbsp;感染呈世界性分布，具普遍性。弓形虫IgM&nbsp;主要用于</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">弓形虫急性感染的诊断。妊娠期妇女感染弓形虫会引起流</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">产、早产、胎儿宫内死亡、婴儿脑积液、神经发育障碍等。风</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">疹病毒</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">IgM&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">主要用于诊断风疹病毒急性感染。成人及儿童</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">感染风疹病毒会引起皮疹、淋巴结肿大。妊娠期妇女感染风</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">疹病毒会造成胎儿损伤，如新生儿畸形、肝脾肿大、神经发育</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">障碍、先天性心脏病等。巨细胞病毒</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">IgM&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">主要用于诊断巨细</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">胞病毒急性感染。成人感染巨细胞病毒后可引起肝炎、肺炎</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">等。孕妇感染巨细胞病毒会造成胎儿受损，最终导致胎儿宫</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">内死亡。新生儿感染会出现黄疸、血小板减少性紫癜、溶血</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">性贫血、脑损伤。单纯疱疹病毒</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">(HSV)[1]&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">能引起多种感染，如</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">黏膜皮肤表面感染、生殖器和肛门感染、中枢神经系统感染</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">以及偶见的内脏感染。孕妇感染</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">HSV&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">可使胎儿产生先天性</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">感染，诱发流产、早产、死胎、畸形，新生儿</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">HSV&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">感染病死率</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">高，幸存者常有后遗症。女性生殖器</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">HSV</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">感染与宫颈癌的发</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">生密切相关。</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">HSV&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">分</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">HSV-1&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">与</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">HSV-22&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">种血清型</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">[1]</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">，常见</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">为</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">HSV-1</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">，主要引起皮肤、黏膜感染，</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">HSV-2&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">则与生殖器感</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">染、新生儿感染及宫颈癌的发生相关</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">[4]</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">。</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">综上所述，应加强孕妇对TORCH</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">危害性的认识，自觉</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">进行孕前TORCH</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">筛查，以及时发现、治疗或注射疫苗，达</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">到优生目的。对妊娠早期及中期检测出TOR</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">CH-IgM&nbsp;</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">阳性</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">者，建议终止妊娠。对妊娠晚期或不愿终止妊娠的孕妇应积</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">极治疗，并进行超声检测，发现胎儿畸形应建议终止妊娠，以</span><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-family: 宋体; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.6;\">提高人口生育质量。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	来源：广东省妇幼医学遗传中心</p>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;</div>\r\n','','','119.136.153.240');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('147','6','&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<br />\r\n<pre>\r\n                              综合部：肖克袭  </pre>\r\n<p>\r\n	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 每个人心中都有一个关于旅行的梦想。这个梦想不论大小、时间和空间的距离。总有那么一天，我们会为这个梦想，义无反顾地背上我们的行囊。在这轻风细雨的时光里，我们公司所有的小伙伴也都背上了行囊出游了。让我们在工作之余，让身心得到一次亲近自然，放空心灵的体验，温泉之旅在这有着丝丝凉意的季节里给我们带来了深深的温意！</p>\r\n<br />\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" height=\"288\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180115/1-1P115133F92M.png\" width=\"481\" /></div>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" height=\"382\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180115/1-1P115133UU33.png\" width=\"480\" /></div>\r\n<div>\r\n	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 身未动，心已远。1月6日的早上我们集体乘车出发了，在2018年的开年之际，我们集体带着欢乐的笑声朝着惠州的龙门铁泉前进，在车上来自导游与我们的互动，有山歌，有二人转，也有各自轻松愉快的调侃，在热烈气氛中，小伙伴们的笑声如山涧清泉，咚咚欢畅；如雾中荷香，幽然不绝。伴随着窗外细雨不停挥洒，车内的欢声笑语，三个小时的车程，我们踏上了目的土地。</div>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180115/1-1P115141230G6.png\" style=\"width: 558px; height: 420px;\" /><br />\r\n	<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>\r\n <o:OfficeDocumentSettings>\r\n  <o:RelyOnVML/>\r\n  <o:AllowPNG/>\r\n </o:OfficeDocumentSettings>\r\n</xml><![endif]-->\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 6.25pt 0cm; text-indent: 24pt; line-height: 18.15pt; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%; text-align: left;\">\r\n		<span style=\"color:black\">庄园式的酒店，层峦叠翠的小山，碧波荡漾的池水。当然最主要的还是我们的亚洲第一泉温泉。这一切都笼罩在和风细雨里，一眼望去，寂静无声，仿佛外面的嬉戏吵闹一切的一切都与它无关，我们的到来就像揭开这一薄纱，眼中的是精致美色，心里是温暖的意境，山中的温泉所冲出的热气，似云互相追逐，似雾幻化无穷。上善如水，水善利万物而有静，在温泉中，放空了身心，洗去了红尘中的烦恼。&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><br />\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 人生最好的旅行，就是你在一个陌生的地方，发现一种久违的感动。大家合影之际，一位为我们拍照的阿姨给我们上了生动的一课，她的热情，专业，细致以及认真的态度给我们留下了深深的印象。我们的大家庭精诚团结、凝心聚力都在最后的一曲舞蹈中得到体现，即使是路人也给了我们称赞，认可。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 6.25pt 0cm; text-indent: 24pt; line-height: 18.15pt; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180115/1-1P11514150C53.png\" style=\"width: 557px; height: 333px;\" /></p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 6.25pt 0cm; text-indent: 24pt; line-height: 18.15pt; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%;\">\r\n		<img alt=\"\" height=\"360\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180115/1-1P1151415392G.png\" width=\"565\" /></p>\r\n	<p style=\"text-align: left;\">\r\n		&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 一辈子是场修行，短的是旅行，长的是人生。转瞬即逝的两天里面，我们一路的笑脸，一路的美食体验，使身心都得到了满满的愉悦感。在这两天的时间里，大家结伴游玩，多的是亲近。我相信我们这个大家庭以后会越来越好，衷心的感谢公司领导带领我们的亚洲第一泉之旅。希望我们在这个大集体中，以后一路有你，尽显华宇雄风，携手共进，再创天地辉煌。</p>\r\n	<p style=\"margin: 6.25pt 0cm; text-indent: 24pt; line-height: 18.15pt; background: white none repeat scroll 0% 0%; text-align: left;\">\r\n		<br />\r\n		&nbsp;</p>\r\n	<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>\r\n <w:WordDocument>\r\n style=\"font-size:10.5pt;\r\nmso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:微软雅黑;mso-bidi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\r\ncolor:black;mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:\r\nZH-CN;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA\">&mdash;<span lang=\"EN-US\">16</span>日，维润赛润生物技术（深圳）有限公司举办的<span lang=\"EN-US\">2017</span>年维润赛润产品技术培训研讨会议在深圳召开。</span>\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:10.5pt;\r\nmso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:微软雅黑;mso-bidi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\r\ncolor:black;mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:\r\nZH-CN;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180115/1-1P115164S6462.png\" style=\"width: 500px; height: 263px;\" /></span></div>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:10.5pt;\r\nmso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:微软雅黑;mso-bidi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\r\ncolor:black;mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:\r\nZH-CN;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA\"><span id=\"cke_bm_254S\" style=\"display: none;\">&nbsp;</span></span><br />\r\n<span style=\"font-size:10.5pt;\r\nmso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:微软雅黑;mso-bidi-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;\r\ncolor:black;mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:\r\nZH-CN;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <span id=\"cke_bm_271S\" style=\"display: none;\">&nbsp;</span>本次培训研讨会议采取&ldquo;理论培训+实验室现场操作培训&rdquo;相结合的创新模式，是维润赛润生物技术（深圳）有限公司作为维润赛润亚太区培训基地的一次重要创新举措。部分重点经销商的总经理应邀参加研讨，对市场竞争格局和形势进行了深入的研究和探讨，就如何开展下一步合作充分交换了意见，参会经销商均表示有信心与维润赛润公司携手合作开辟更广阔的市场。部分重点经销商的技术骨干参加了理论及实验室操作培训，通过在中南医学检验实验室上机操作，大家进一步提高了维润赛润产品的实验操作技能，对维润赛润产品的质量有了更深刻的体会和更坚定的信心。本次培训研讨会得到了参会经销商的一致好评，德国维润赛润研发有限公司CEO &nbsp;Dr. St&uuml;ermer，Gulbahr女士祝贺技术培训研讨会圆满成功！<span id=\"cke_bm_271E\" style=\"display: none;\">&nbsp;</span><span id=\"cke_bm_254E\" style=\"display: none;\">&nbsp;</span><!--[if gte mso 维润赛润生物技术（深圳）有限公司在宁紫妍总经理的领导下，高度重视经销商的培训工作。把培训的重点拟定为提高实验技术人员的操作能力和水平上来，不断创新培训模式，进一步丰富技能培训、理论培训、互帮互学、人人上台实验等多形式的培训方式，提高培训层次和水平。为经销商技术人员技能水平的提高提供平台，加强对岗位培训的需求分析、目标确定、课程设计和效果评估，提高培训的针对性和实效性；注重对技术员培训的指导、帮助、督促和检查；为各经销商做更好的技术支持服务!\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180115/1-1P1151A6004H.png\" style=\"width: 500px; height: 333px;\" /></div>\r\n<span id=\"cke_bm_107E\" style=\"display: none;\">&nbsp;</span>','','','119.136.155.19');

style=\"mso-bidi-font-weight:normal\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:\r\nCalibri;mso-hansi-font-family:Calibri\">年总结年会暨</span><span lang=\"EN-US\">2018</span></b><b style=\"font-family:\r\n宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Calibri;mso-hansi-font-family:Calibri\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 作者：朱峰、王赫群</span><br />\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 21pt;\">\r\n	<big><span style=\"mso-bidi-font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体\">鸡去长空辞旧岁，狗来大地迎新春。满怀丰收的喜悦，<span style=\"color:#333333;background:white\">满载胜利的荣耀，</span><span lang=\"EN-US\">2018</span>年<span lang=\"EN-US\">1</span>月<span lang=\"EN-US\">13</span>日，维润赛润生物技术（深圳）有限公司及中南医学检验实验室共同迎来了<span lang=\"EN-US\">2017</span>年总结年会暨<span lang=\"EN-US\">2018</span>年工作会议。<span id=\"cke_bm_134E\" style=\"display: none;\"> </span><span id=\"cke_bm_133E\" style=\"display: none;\"> </span><span 会议伊始，闵书亮博士首先发表了热情洋溢的新年贺词。闵博士感谢大家地过去一年所付出的努力，他指出<span lang=\"EN-US\">2017</span>我们艰苦卓绝、凤凰涅槃，奠定了未来发展的基础，<span lang=\"EN-US\">2018</span>年希望全体员工同心同德、努力拼搏，争取更大的进步。闵博士的发言点燃了全体员工对<span lang=\"EN-US\">2018</span>年的热切期盼。</span><br />\r\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;\r\nmso-fareast-language:ZH-CN;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180117/1-1P11G0112MC.png\" style=\"width: 500px; height: 333px;\" /></span></div>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;\r\nmso-fareast-language:ZH-CN;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA\"><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>\r\n <w:WordDocument>\r\n  <w:View>Normal</w:View>\r\n  <w:Zoom>0</w:Zoom>\r\n  <w:PunctuationKerning/>\r\n  <w:DrawingGridVerticalSpacing>7.8 磅</w:DrawingGridVerticalSpacing>\r\n </w:WordDocument>\r\n</xml><![endif]--></span>\r\n<p align=\"left\" class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-align:left;text-indent:21.0pt;\r\nmso-char-indent-count:2.0\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-size:14px;\"><span lang=\"EN-US\" style=\"font-family: 宋体;\">2017</span><span style=\"font-family: 宋体;\">年，公司全体员工锐意进取，克服了百般艰难险阻，取得了可观的成绩。<span lang=\"EN-US\">5</span>月上旬，中南医学检验实验室获得深圳市卫计委批准，完成执业登记，正式成为一家医疗机构。<span lang=\"EN-US\">5</span>月中旬，维润赛润<span lang=\"EN-US\">18</span>项产品延续注册获得国家药监局的批准，为维润赛润品牌在中国市场持续发展奠定了坚实基础。<span lang=\"EN-US\">5</span>月下旬，宁总带队考察台湾市场，走访了台湾新生儿筛检中心，并与台湾新生儿筛检领域专家进行了学术研讨。在与台湾第一家经销商签署合作协议后，公司完成了台湾地区第一张销售订单，这标志着公司正式进军亚太市场。<span lang=\"EN-US\">11</span>月，公司成功举办了维润赛润经销商培训研讨会，中南实验室作为维润赛润亚太区培训基地，第一次为学员提供实验操作的培训课程。<span lang=\"EN-US\">12</span>月，公司成功递交<span lang=\"EN-US\">5</span>项发明专利申请，长期的技术积累使公司科研工作厚积薄发，开花结果<span id=\"cke_bm_106E\" style=\"display: none;\">&nbsp;</span>。</span></span><br />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"text-indent: 21pt; text-align: center;\">\r\n	<span style=\"font-family: 宋体;\"><img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180117/1-1P11G01219350.png\" style=\"width: 500px; height: 333px;\" /></span></p>\r\n<span style=\"font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;\r\nmso-fareast-language:ZH-CN;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA\"><span style=\"font-size:10.5pt;font-family:宋体;\r\nmso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:1.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;\r\nmso-fareast-language:ZH-CN;mso-bidi-language:AR-SA\">&nbsp; &nbsp; 昨日的成绩来之不易，凝聚了全体员工的辛勤汗水，公司市场部、运营部、注册部、培训部、客服部、技术部、财务部、总经办等部门员工一一上台述职，大家回顾了<span lang=\"EN-US\">2017</span>年的努力和收获，在总结经验和不足的同时更提出了<span lang=\"EN-US\">2018</span>年的目标和行动计划。学习、创新和执行成为<span lang=\"EN-US\">2018</span>年的核心主题。在真诚而热烈的气氛中，我们真正感受到公司大家庭的温暖，这已经不仅仅是一下上下班的场所，更是我们事业的舞台、生活的依靠、精神的家园！</span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>\r\n <w:LatentStyles DefLockedState=\"false\"
