INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('150','6','<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	妊娠期 TORCH 筛查中的「TORCH」一词最早是由美国埃默里大学（Emory University）免疫学家 Andre Nahmia 于 1971 年提出。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	Nahmia 将复杂的围产期感染综合后称之为 TORCH，弓形虫（To）、风疹（R）、巨细胞病毒（C）、单纯疱疹病毒 1 型或 2 型（H）。从 TORCH 概念的提出至今已近半个世纪，妊娠期 4 种病原微生物抗体筛查实验应不应该做? 怎样做? 至今医学界仍在争议中。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	2011 年中华医学会妇产科学会产科学组：《孕前和孕期保健指南》第 1 版将 TORCH 筛查列为孕前 3 个月首选备查项目。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	妊娠前（准备近期怀孕）或妊娠期TORCHCH筛查<br />\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180201/1-1P2010Z630156.jpg\" style=\"width: 800px; height: 543px;\" /></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 10px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 10px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; display: inline-block; width: 670px; border-left-color: rgb(40, 192, 213); border-right-color: rgb(40, 192, 213); border-radius: 5px 0px 0px 5px; box-shadow: rgb(153, 153, 153) 0em 0.2em 0.2em; border-style: solid; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n				<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n						<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.6;\">巨细胞病毒筛查</strong></section>\r\n						</section>\r\n					</section>\r\n				</section>\r\n			</section>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	1. 采用血清学方法和尿 CMV-DNA 定量检测方法对孕妇进行常规巨细胞病毒筛查。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	2. 对于妊娠期有流行性感冒样症状或超声声像结果显示疑似巨细胞病毒感染的孕妇可以考虑对其行巨细胞病毒血清学检测。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	3. 血清反应阴性（IgG 阴性）的健康保健人员和保育员应该在妊娠期进行血清学监测。对于有可能接触婴幼儿尿液和唾液的孕妇（IgG 阴性）也应进行血清学监测。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	4. 妊娠期初次母体巨细胞感染的诊断应该基于孕妇血清中病毒特异性 IgG 抗体的新出现（这些孕妇之前的血清反应为阴性），或者发现特异性的 IgM 抗体并伴随 IgG 抗体亲和力的降低。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	5. 复发感染的诊断应该基于孕妇之前检测 IgG 抗体阳性，本次 IgG 抗体滴度的显著升高（定量检测上升 4 倍），伴有或者不伴有 IgM 抗体的出现，以及 IgG 的高亲和力（&le; 16 周）；唾液或咽拭子标本或人体其他组织培养巨细胞病毒阳性; 或者从尿液，唾液或咽拭子标本或人体其他组织定量 PCR 检测巨细胞病毒高拷贝数。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	6. 对初次感染孕妇，应告知夫妻双方其宫内垂直传播和胎儿感染风险为 30%-40%，如胎儿被感染，其生后出现后遗症的风险为 20%-25%。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	7. 对复发感染的孕妇，也应告知夫妻双方其宫内垂直传播和胎儿感染的风险为 1%，如果胎儿被感染，其生后出现后遗症的风险为 20%-25%。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	8. 胎儿巨细胞病毒感染的产前诊断应该基于羊膜腔穿刺术。羊膜腔穿刺术应该在妊娠 21 周后，并且在推测母体感染至少 7 周后进行。这个时间间隔非常重要，因为胎儿感染后病毒在肾脏的复制需要 5-7 周的时间，分泌到羊水中的病毒量才可以被检出。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	9. 孕妇复发巨细胞病毒感染时，可以考虑采取羊膜腔穿刺，但由于垂直传播率低，相应的风险收益比并不高。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	10. 一旦诊断胎儿巨细胞病毒感染，孕妇应该每隔 2-4 周进行系列超声检查以便发现超声声像异常。这种声像异常有助于我们推测胎儿的预后，但我们应认识到超声声像没有异常并不能确保胎儿正常。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	11. 羊水中巨细胞病毒-DNA 的定量测定可以帮助预测胎儿结局。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 10px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 10px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; display: inline-block; width: 670px; border-left-color: rgb(40, 192, 213); border-right-color: rgb(40, 192, 213); border-radius: 5px 0px 0px 5px; box-shadow: rgb(153, 153, 153) 0em 0.2em 0.2em; border-style: solid; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n				<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n						<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px; line-height: 28.8px;\">风疹病毒筛查</strong></section>\r\n						</section>\r\n					</section>\r\n				</section>\r\n			</section>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">1. 准备怀孕妇女最好进行咨询，测定抗体状态，必要时接种风疹疫苗。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">2. 由于先天性风疹综合征风险随感染时孕周变化，所以必须知道准确孕周，这对咨询很关键。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	3. 原发性母体感染应该通过血清学试验诊断。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	4. 暴露于风疹或有症状的孕妇，应该做血清学试验确定免疫状态和先天性风疹综合征的风险。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	5. 怀孕时不应该接种风疹疫苗，但产后是安全的。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	6. 孕早期不小心接种疫苗或接种后立即怀孕，孕妇是安全的，因为尚无该种情况下患先天性风疹综合征病例报道。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	7. 妊娠期筛查风疹病毒应该 IgG、IgM 抗体同时检测。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 10px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 10px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; display: inline-block; width: 670px; border-left-color: rgb(40, 192, 213); border-right-color: rgb(40, 192, 213); border-radius: 5px 0px 0px 5px; box-shadow: rgb(153, 153, 153) 0em 0.2em 0.2em; border-style: solid; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n				<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n						<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px; line-height: 28.8px;\">弓形体筛查</strong></section>\r\n						</section>\r\n					</section>\r\n				</section>\r\n			</section>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">1. 所有妊娠或计划妊娠的妇女，应在妊娠期间详细了解预防妊娠期感染弓形体的知识。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">2. 不应在低风险孕妇中进行常规普遍筛查。血清学筛查应该提供给被认为处在初次感染弓形体高风险孕妇。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	3. 妊娠妇女疑似近期感染，在介入诊断前应该在参比实验室进行检测，检测必须尽可能准确反映感染情况，并能做出解释。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	4. 为确认弓形体感染，下列情况应该使用 PCR 技术检测羊水中弓形体 DNA：&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	（1）孕妇诊断为初次感染;（2）血清学测定不能确认或排除急性感染;（3）出现异常超声结果（颅内钙化、小头畸形、脑积水、腹水、</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	肝脾肿大、或严重的胎儿宫内生长受限)。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	5. 羊膜穿刺时间应＞18 周，而且在母亲疑似感染 4 周后，以降低假阴性结果的发生。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	6. 疑似孕妇弓形体感染，应该用超声筛查，看超声结果是否与 TORCH（弓形体、风疹、巨细胞病毒、疱疹病毒和其他）结果一致。包括但不限于颅内钙化，小头畸形，脑积水，腹水，肝脾肿大或严重的胎儿宫内生长受限。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	7. 如果怀疑有急性感染，重复测试应在 2-3 周内进行，并考虑到乙酰螺旋霉素立即开始治疗，无需等待重复的测试结果。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	8. 如果产妇感染已得到证实，但目前还不知道胎儿是否被感染，应给予乙酰螺旋霉素对胎儿进行预防（防止垂直传播）。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	9. 已确诊或高度怀疑胎儿感染的孕妇（羊水 PCR 阳性），应联合使用乙胺嘧啶，磺胺嘧啶，甲酰四氢叶酸给予治疗。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	10. 曾经感染过弓形体已获得免疫的孕妇，不需要做抗弓形体治疗。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	11. 每个疑似弓形体感染的病例，都应与专家讨论。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	12. 免疫抑制或 HIV 阳性的妇女应接受筛检，因为有弓形体激活和患弓形体脑炎的风险。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	13. 被确诊为急性弓形体感染未孕妇女，要等待 6 个月后再怀孕，每个病例应该咨询专家。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 10px 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n			<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 10px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; display: inline-block; width: 670px; border-left-color: rgb(40, 192, 213); border-right-color: rgb(40, 192, 213); border-radius: 5px 0px 0px 5px; box-shadow: rgb(153, 153, 153) 0em 0.2em 0.2em; border-style: solid; border-width: 0px 0px 0px 10px; background-color: rgb(239, 239, 239);\">\r\n				<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n					<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n						<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n							<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n								<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 25.6px;\">单纯疱疹病毒筛查</strong></span></section>\r\n						</section>\r\n					</section>\r\n				</section>\r\n			</section>\r\n		</section>\r\n	</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	1. 妊娠期妇女应尽早检查生殖器疱疹（HSV）感染情况。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	2. 妇女出现单纯 HSV 的反复发作时，应被告知分娩期间病毒可能传染给新生儿的危险性。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	3. 妊娠晚期妇女患有原发性 HSV 时，新生儿获得 HSV 传染的概率非常高，临床医师应建议孕妇采取剖宫产减低感染风险。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	4. 孕妇分娩期间复发 HSV 感染，对于有前驱症状或怀疑已存在的功能损害与 HSV 有关时，应给予剖宫产。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	5. 对于妊娠期复发的 HSV，应在第 36 周给予阿昔洛韦和伐昔洛韦抑制病毒复制，降低病变发生概率，减少病毒传播，同时降低施剖宫产率。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px 0px 25px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	6. 准备怀孕或怀孕妇女无 HSV 感染病史，但配偶患有生殖器 HSV 感染时，应在怀孕前或在妊娠期间尽早进行血清学检查，确诊是否感染 HSV，并在妊娠第 32～34 周期间复查。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 来源：妇产时间/检验医学</p>\r\n','','','119.136.152.35');

INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('152','6','<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">作者：广东省第二人民医院风湿免疫科 &nbsp;黄正平</strong></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	类风湿因子（RF）检查是风湿免疫科常见的一个检查项目，大部分怀疑类风湿关节炎的患者临床医生都会给他们开这样的检查项目，甚至在一部分健康体检中都会有这个检查项目。目的就是为风湿病的诊断提供实验室证据。然而，很多人拿到报告，看到类风湿因子阳性或类风湿因子比正常值要高，都会不由的开始紧张起来，以为自己一定就是类风湿关节炎了。然而，这并不绝对。还有很多情况可以出现类风湿因子阳性。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; text-align: center; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180201/1-1P201092121507.jpg\" style=\"width: 962px; height: 722px;\" /><br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">类风湿关节炎患者双手畸形</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	首先，让我们来了解一下什么是类风湿因子。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">我们体内有一种免疫球蛋白叫免疫球蛋白G（IgG），它是血清主要的抗体成分，约占血清Ig的75%，主要在我们体内起保护作用。它的主要结构包括两个Fab片段和一个Fc片段组成。如下图：<br />\r\n	<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180201/1-1P201092154947.jpg\" style=\"width: 715px; height: 565px;\" /></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">而类风湿因子其实也是抗体，是针对已经变性的IgG抗体Fc片段上抗原成分产生的自身抗体。我们可以将类风湿因子理解为针对体内抗体的抗体。类风湿因子包括IgM、IgA、IgG、IgD、IgE五型，这些抗体与IgG的Fc段结合，介导一系列的生物学反应，如调节体内免疫反应；激活补体，加快清除微生物感染；清除免疫复合物使机体免受循环复合物的损伤；参与骨质破坏等。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">类风湿因子对于类风湿关节炎的诊断是非常重要的，它可以帮助风湿科医生更好的诊断疾病。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">然而，类风湿因子阳性，就一定是类风湿关节炎了吗？</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">未必。类风湿因子阳性可以有一下几种可能：</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(0, 128, 255);\">1、类风湿关节炎</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">正如它的名字一样，类风湿因子主要见于类风湿关节炎，70%左右的类风湿患者的血清里面都可以检测到类风湿因子。类风湿因子存在于类风湿性关节炎患者的血清和关节液中，在类风湿关节炎患者中有IgM、IgG和IgE三型，其中IgM型是临床中最常检测的类型。类风湿因子无疑参与了类风湿关节炎的发病，在类风湿关节炎分类标准中，也将类风湿因子阳性作为类风湿关节炎分类标准的一个指标。而且，滴度的高低与类风湿关节炎的活动性和严重性成正比，高低度的类风湿因子水平，是类风湿关节炎预后不良的指标。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">并非所有的类风湿关节炎都会出现类风湿因子，因此，类风湿因子阴性，不一定没有类风湿关节炎。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">类风湿因子也不是类风湿关节炎的特异性抗体，其他风湿免疫性疾病、感染、肿瘤甚至正常人都可以出现类风湿因子阳性。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(0, 128, 255);\">2、其他风湿免疫性疾病</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">除了类风湿关节炎，其他风湿免疫性疾病如系统性红斑狼疮、干燥综合征、皮肌炎、硬皮病、混合性结缔组织病、血管炎等都可以出现类风湿因子阳性的情况。但在上述风湿病中，类风湿因子的阳性率，如在系统性红斑狼疮患者中阳性率为20%&mdash;25%；在硬皮病与皮肌炎患者中阳性率为10%&mdash;25%，且滴度均较低。有研究显示，类风湿因子阳性的病人，更容易出现关节受累。四川大学学者随机选择30例类风湿因子阳性系统性红斑狼疮患者与30例类风湿因子阴性的系统性红斑狼疮患者做对照，观察两组间关节受累情况。结果发现，类风湿因子阳性组中27例有关节受累，其中24例有关节炎，3例仅有关节痛，类风湿因子阴性组有18例关节受累，其中6例有关节炎，12例仅有关节痛，两组在总的关节受累及是否出现关节炎方面有显著性差异。因此，类风湿因子阳性的系统性红斑狼疮患者较类风湿因子阴性的系统性红斑狼疮患者更易出现关节的受累。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(0, 128, 255);\">3、感染</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">我国是乙肝大国，慢性病毒性肝炎患者存在自身免疫现象，血清中可以检测出类风湿因子。延安大学附属医院学者曾经进行乙型肝炎病毒感染与血清类风湿因子相关性研究，研究发现HBeAg阳性慢性乙型肝炎RF阳性率为25%,HBeAg阴性慢性乙型肝炎RF阳性率为15%,乙型肝炎肝硬化代偿期RF阳性率为25%,乙型肝炎肝硬化失代偿期RF阳性率为35%,肝癌RF阳性率为33.33%,健康对照组RF阳性率为4%。慢性乙型肝炎病毒感染者与健康对照组RF阳性率之间差异有显著统计学意义。除此之外，其他类型的肝炎、流行性感冒、寄生虫感染、结核、梅毒等感染都可以出现类风湿因子的阳性。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(0, 128, 255);\">4、血液系统疾病</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">传染性单核细胞增多症属于一种EB病毒感染的单核-巨噬细胞系统急性增生性传染病，人体内都存在有产生RF的B细胞克隆，在EB病毒直接作用下，可大量合成类风湿因子。此外，高丙种球蛋白性紫癜、冷球蛋白血症、白血病等血液系统疾病都可以出现类风湿因子阳性。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(0, 128, 255);\">5、肿瘤放化疗后</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">很多肿瘤放疗或化疗后，导致机体免疫紊乱，IgG变性，产生类风湿因子。因此，肿瘤放化疗后的病人，可以检测到类风湿因子。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 18px;\"><strong style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\"><span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6; color: rgb(0, 128, 255);\">6、健康人</span></strong></span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">有研究对健康人群的类风湿因子阳性率进行研究，发现不管男女老少，都检测到一部分健康人群类风湿因子阳性，阳性率大约占2%，且随着年龄增长阳性率有升高现象。上述类风湿关节炎潜伏阶段的人群也可以算是健康人群，因为他们在检测类风湿因子阳性的时候并没有发生类风湿关节炎。因此，健康人类风湿因子阳性，也要追踪随访。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<span style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; line-height: 1.6;\">综上，类风湿因子阳性并不都是类风湿关节炎，要注意排除其他疾病，也要密切追踪随访，定期检查。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	来源：好大夫在线</p>\r\n','','','119.136.152.35');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('154','37','一、检测原理<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 酶联免疫吸附测定法（Enzyme&mdash;Linked &nbsp; ImmunoSorbent &nbsp; &nbsp;Assay，ELISA），特别适用于测定感染血清中的抗体。其反应原理是以抗原与抗体的特异性反应为基础的。在赛润ELISA Classic &nbsp; &nbsp;检测微孔板的不同微孔中，包被了特异性的病原体抗原，用于定性和定量检测人血清/血浆/脑脊液样本中的特异性抗体。<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 如果患者的血清样本中存在特异性抗体，抗原就会与之结合。二抗，是碱性磷酸酶标记的抗体，能够检测酶免复合物，并与之结合，无色的底物对硝基苯磷酸盐转变为有色产物对硝基苯酚，反应产物的颜色强度与样本中抗体物质的浓度成正比，并可通过酶标仪测量读取结果。<br />\r\n二、产品优势 &nbsp; &nbsp;<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 德国维润赛润研发有限公司具有30多年的抗原研发生产经验，自主生产质量稳定、高灵敏度和高特异性的病原体抗原，整个生产工艺层层严控，体外诊断试剂产品具有可溯源性，为全球80多个国家临床实验室、研究机构提供高质量的体外诊断试剂。<br />\r\n&nbsp; 1、高品质、高灵敏度和高特异性的病原体抗原。<br />\r\n&nbsp; 2、使用国际公认的4PL单点定量方法，结果精确可靠。<br />\r\n&nbsp; 3、采用单点校准技术，高效，经济，省时省力。<br />\r\n&nbsp; 4、提供批次特异性标准曲线，用户无需自行绘制标准曲线，省时便捷。<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;酶标板条为可拆卸型，可自主灵活选择测定项目，无需等待大量样本才进行检测，无需浪费其他的未使用的检测条，从而具有较好的经济性。<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;科学合理的设置检测结果的灰区范围，最大限度地检出可疑样本，防止弱阳性样本的漏检情况。提供基于Microsoft &nbsp; Excel的SERION &nbsp;Evaluate评估软件，可快速定量分析结果。<br />\r\n三、国际公认的4PL定量及单点校准技术<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 4PL模型（4-Parameter &nbsp; Logistic &nbsp;model）是目前世界上公认的具有高精确度的用于标准曲线拟合的模型（Ricketts &nbsp;J &nbsp;et &nbsp;al，2013；john &nbsp;W.A &nbsp;et &nbsp;al，2007）。用4PL逻辑模型拟合反映抗体浓度吸光度值之间的非线性性关系，具有非常高的准确度和精确度。<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;<img alt=\"\" src=\"/uploads/allimg/180228/1-1P22Q50432E4.png\" style=\"width: 655px; height: 264px;\" /><br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; SERION &nbsp;ELISA &nbsp; Classic 检测试剂每批产品出厂前均经过严格的质控和反复验证，确定A-D等参数，以获得精准得定量检测结果，并且每批产品均提供标准曲线图，客户无需再花时间绘制。<br />\r\n四、单点校准的科学性和高效性<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 系统的波动性会引起检测试剂分析的变异性，为了抵消批间检测分析的变异性，使用单点校准的校准品即可完成校准。<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 其他厂家的大部分ELISA试剂使用一系列的多个校准品，在每轮测试操作时建立新得标准曲线，造成成本增加，这是不必要的，相反可以通过使用一个校正因子将操作者的测试水平精准校正至预设的4PL标准曲线。<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 为使测试水平适合给定的4PL标准曲线，校正因子F通过将校准血清的参考OD值与实际测试得到的标准血清OD值进行计算得到。<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 校正因子F=标准血清的参考OD值/标准血清实际OD值（以减去空白）。<br />\r\n&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; 用校正因子F乘以患者样本的OD值，将每个单独测试水平调节到给定的4PL标准曲线，由此抵消了批间分析的变异性，也可从4PL标准曲线上直接评估抗体活性。如果测定的标准血清的OD值与质量控制证书上注明的标准血清有效范围内的OD值对应，将确保测试水平精确校准到标准曲线上。因此，SERISN &nbsp; Elisa &nbsp; Classic试剂的单点校准只使用1个校准品进行抗体定量，确保了精确性，同时节约成本。','','','119.136.154.160');
INSERT INTO `dede_addonarticle` VALUES('155','6','<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&nbsp;在美国，医疗器械的种类有数千种之多，小到隐形眼镜、医用手套、手术刀、按摩器、心脏起搏器、体温表、电热垫、压舌片、轮椅等，大到B超机、洗肾机、螺旋CT机等各种专业医疗器械。凡与医疗保健有关，而非药品的产品皆属医疗器械的范畴。《联邦食品、药品和化妆品法》201（h）节对&ldquo;医疗器械&rdquo;（Medical Device）的定义为：<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&ldquo;仪器、设备、工具、机械、装置、植入物、体外用试剂，或其它相似或相关物品，包括组件、零件或附件。所有这些：<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&mdash;为《美国国家处方集》或《美国药典》或它们的增补件中所认可；<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	&mdash;预期用于人或动物疾病或其它症状的诊断，或用于疾病的治疗、缓减、处理或预防，或者&mdash;&mdash; 预期影响人体或动物的身体结构或任何功能，但不通过体内或体表的化学作用，不依赖代谢来达到其预期目标&rdquo;。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	符合以上定义的产品都被看作医疗器械，这类产品要在美国市场销售就必须得到FDA认可。根据以上定义，医疗器械作为维护健康的产品，不包括旨在通过在人体内外的化学反应或是新陈代谢治疗疾病的产品；通过化学反应或是新陈代谢发挥作用的产品是药品。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	美国FDA认证中把医疗器械根据产品风险分为三级：Ⅰ级、Ⅱ级、Ⅲ级。<br />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section data-id=\"63576\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; border: 0px none; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section data-width=\"100%\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 670px; text-align: center;\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 10px 0px -10px -0.14em; padding: 10px 0px 15px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 1.3rem; letter-spacing: 0.14em; border-top-width: 3px; border-top-style: solid; border-top-color: rgb(33, 33, 34); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-color: rgb(198, 198, 199);\">\r\n			<span data-brushtype=\"text\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(12, 12, 11);\">Ⅰ级医疗器械&mdash;&mdash;普通管理</span></section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	Ⅰ级医疗器械的设计通常比Ⅱ级和Ⅲ级医疗器械简单，且使用的潜在危险性较小，例如弹性绷带、检诊手套、手持外科器械属于Ⅰ级医疗器械。美国对Ⅰ级医疗器械给予最低程度的管理和监督。Ⅰ级医疗器械与Ⅱ级、Ⅲ级医疗器械一样，都需遵守医疗器械的普通管理规定。医疗器械的普通管理包括企业注册、产品登记、良好制造规范（GMP）要求、标签要求和上市前通知（pre-market notification，PMN，510(k)）。<br />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section data-id=\"63576\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; border: 0px none; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section data-width=\"100%\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 670px; text-align: center;\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 10px 0px -10px -0.14em; padding: 10px 0px 15px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 1.3rem; letter-spacing: 0.14em; border-top-width: 3px; border-top-style: solid; border-top-color: rgb(33, 33, 34); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-color: rgb(198, 198, 199);\">\r\n			<span data-brushtype=\"text\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(12, 12, 11);\">Ⅱ级医疗器械&mdash;&mdash;强制执行性能标准</span></section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	Ⅱ级医疗器械是指单独依靠医疗器械的普通管理不足以确保医疗器械的安全性和有效性，而采取一些例如强制执行性能标准等特殊管理措施可以提供相应的安全和有效性保证。例如，动力轮椅、输液泵、外科用消毒盖布等属于Ⅱ级医疗器械。Ⅱ级医疗器械除了遵守医疗器械的普通管理规定外，还必须遵守医疗器械的强制执行的性能标准。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<section data-id=\"63576\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; border: 0px none; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	<section data-width=\"100%\" style=\"margin: 10px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 670px; text-align: center;\">\r\n		<section style=\"margin: 10px 0px -10px -0.14em; padding: 10px 0px 15px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 1.3rem; letter-spacing: 0.14em; border-top-width: 3px; border-top-style: solid; border-top-color: rgb(33, 33, 34); border-bottom-width: 1px; border-bottom-style: solid; border-bottom-color: rgb(198, 198, 199);\">\r\n			<span data-brushtype=\"text\" style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important; color: rgb(12, 12, 11);\">Ⅲ级医疗器械&mdash;&mdash;上市前批准（Pre-market Approval，PMA）</span></section>\r\n	</section>\r\n	<section style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box; word-wrap: break-word !important; width: 0px; height: 0px; clear: both;\">\r\n		&nbsp;</section>\r\n</section>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	Ⅲ级医疗器械是管理最严厉的医疗器械，是指通过普通管理和强制执行性能标准仍不能确保医疗器械的安全和有效性。Ⅲ级医疗器械包括一些用于支撑和延续人体生命、或对人身健康具有重要的保护作用、或具有较大程度潜在风险的医疗器械。Ⅲ级医疗器械上市前通常需要向FDA办理上市前批准（Pre-market Approval，PMA），通过科学的评估以确保其安全有效。例如Ⅲ级医疗器械中的心脏瓣膜置换器械、乳房填充硅胶、植入式小脑刺激器需要办理上市前批准。<br style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\" />\r\n	&nbsp;</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; font-family: 微软雅黑; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	针对医疗器械产品天纵检测在FDA认证中有着较为丰富的实践经验，可为客户的医疗机械产品提供一站式的FDA认证服务。</p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; color: rgb(62, 62, 62); font-family: &quot;Hiragino Sans GB&quot;, &quot;Microsoft YaHei&quot;, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 25.6px; widows: 1; box-sizing: border-box !important; word-wrap: break-word !important;\">\r\n	来源：医疗器械创新网</p>\r\n','','','119.136.154.240');

word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映所采集标本的类型是否符合要求，是检验前的重要质量指标。标本类型符合要求是保证检验结果准确性的前提条件。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em; word-wrap: break-word !important; font-size: 14px;\">意义：反映标本采集量是否正确，是检验前的重要质量指标。标本采集量不足或过多都可能影响检验结果。</span></p>\r\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; max-width: 100%; clear: both; min-height: 1em;
